    • Constructor Detail

      • SgdSvm

        public SgdSvm(double[] x,
              double y,
              double alpha,
              int iterations)

      • SgdSvm

        public SgdSvm(double[] w,
              double[][] x,
              double[] y,
              double alpha,
              int iterations)
        This constructor is initialized for Batch based SGD SVM
        Parameters:
        w - initial weights (random Gaussian Distribution)
        x - data points
        y - labels for corresponding data points
        alpha - learning rate : default = 0.001
        iterations - number of iterations to run the SGD SVM

      • SgdSvm

        public SgdSvm(double[] w,
              double alpha,
              int iterations,
              int features)
        This constructor is initialized for Streaming based SGD SVM
        Parameters:
        w - initial weight
        alpha - learning rate : default 0.001
        iterations - number of iterations
        features - number of features in a data point
